name: Ad Cosmos Ex Terra (Commodore Amiga)
description:
Compilation of 3 previously released games with updates on single disk for Commodore Amiga! 

Min sys req A500 1MB

Lumberjack Revision

Pong4b

Jump Besi Jump

Updates from Lumberjack Reloaded to Revision:
---------------------------------
-Tree is no longer infint. Though trees are pretty tall and get taller by every level
you're able to reach the top of it and the end of the level.
There's 8 levels. Odd ones are spring/summer themed. Even ones are winter themed.
-In odd levels there's a bee that can stun you for a short period.
-Screen shakes while you're drunk 

Updates from Pong4 to PoNG4b:
----------------------------
-Sprites from CD32 version
-revisited music module, now it plays during the gameplay too
